talks.title: Native vs Hybrid

talks.description: Tim Medcalf talks about Native vs Hybrid at the Leeds Tech Hub Meetup 2015. Why you should still consider native despite this multi-platform world.

talks.title: Women In Technology
talks.author: Sky
talks.description:
Sky hosted its first networking event to celebrate Women in Technology, with talks from:

  • Didier Lebrat - CTO at Sky

  • Bella Vuillermoz - Director of Women in Leadership at Sky

  • Kimberley Brown and Stephanie Holmes - Senior Analyst and Associate Developer at Sky

  • Amelia Humfress - CEO of Steer

  • Radhika Sanghani - Journalist at The Guardian

talks.title: Devoxx UK 2015
talks.author: Tom Maule
talks.description: Tom Maule talks about the scalability challenges NOW TV faces with linear streaming, with reference to large sporting events and the popular fantasy drama; Game of Thrones.

talks.title: Couchbase London Meetup
talks.author: Julien Gagnet
talks.description: Julien Gagnet talks about our use of Couchbase as a user profile store.

talks.title: EuroPython 2013
talks.author: Russel Sherwood, David Sale
talks.description: Russell Sherwood and David Sale talk about the key points to give you a taster of what life is like in an agile development team.

talks.title: EuroPython 2012
talks.author: Russel Sherwood, David Sale
talks.description: Russell Sherwood and David Sale cover the role of BDD in Agile Development, creating a successful and useful BDD test and BDD usage in continuous integration.
